description:
rever
=====
release versions of software

quick start
===========
to get started with rever, first put a ``rever.xsh`` file in the root directory of your
source repository,

.. code-block:: sh

    $activities = ['tag']
    $tag_push = false

then, run rever from this directory to execute the release actions you specified.

.. code-block:: sh

    $ rever check
    $ rever 1.42
name: re-ver
